column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
uh i've got a wood underneath my foot how should i treat it

It's important to take good care of any wound in order to minimize the risk of infection. You should start by cleaning the wound with warm soapy water and then protecting it with a sterile bandage or dressing. If the wound is quite deep, you may need to see a doctor so that they can clean it and prescribe a suitable treatment.
